sections.MISSION:
COMMAND:
OIC: SFC Lewis
RSO: 1LT Parada
INDIVIDUAL
sections.EXECUTION:
TIMELINE:
0700: Rappel Masters consolidate at the Rappel Tower. Begin inspecting equipment and rigging tower.
0800: Certify previously identified Lane NCOs.
0900: Troopers to be trained arrive at Camp Aachen Tower.
0915: Safety Brief.
0930: Begin Slant Wall to more familiarize Troopers with Tower Operations.
1030: Begin Wall Side Rappels.
1230: Begin Open Side Rappels.
1500: Tear down and Clean up.
1600: SP to Troop.
sections.KEY TASKS: Execute tough, realistic training that begins with individual
sections.TASKS:
(071-120-0300) Prepare a Rappel Seat (071-120-0301) Prepare a Rappel Hook Up (071-120-0302) Perform an Equipment Rappel
(071-120-0303) Perform a Rappelling Lock in
(071-120-0402) Perform Rappel Master Duties During Rappelling Operation
(071-120-0403) Perform a Rappel Master Personnel Inspection

20x Rappelling Gloves
8x Tower Ropes
4x Slant Wall Ropes
50x Carabiners
4x Harnesses
10x Safety Lines

sections.END STATE: Troopers improve proficiency in Rappelling Operations.
sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
S: PHASE 1: Begins 8AUG2024, at 0700 with the consolidation of the Rappel Masters at the Camp Aachen Rappel Tower.
PHASE 2: Tower and Equipment are inspected for serviceability and Tower is prepped for Rappelling Operations.
PHASE 3: Begins 8AUG2024 at 0900 when the Safety Brief is conducted, and Rappelling Operations begin.
PHASE 4: Begins after the completion of all Rappelling Operations, the Tower is sanitized, and the training area is cleaned.
